section.heading: Tax on unincorporated businesses — Transfer of surtax to Convention Center Authority.

annotations.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 331, ch. 258, art. I, title VIII, § 3a
Washington Convention Center Authority, collection and allocation of taxes under this section, see § 10-1203.07.
annotations.text: Audit of accounts and operation of Authority: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1807.02a.
Expiration of §§ 301, 302 and 303 of D.C. Law 10-188: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1807.02a.
